getAll.description: Returns a list of cards for a given app.

get.description: Returns the definition for a card with the given ID.

create.description: Defines a new card that will become active on an account when this app is installed.

update.description: Update a card definition with new details.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a card definition with the given ID.

getSampleCard.description: Returns an example card detail response.
